website_summaries.verdict: New Balance Cush+ District Run garnered mostly positive feedback from those who have tried it. People are happy with this affordable running shoe’s cushioning and lightweight structure. The flexible outsole and breathable upper were also given praise by many purchasers. Though there are some buyers who have expressed disappointments toward this running shoe’s narrow opening and durability, others still recommended the New Balance District Run for its performance.
pros: Many people are comfortable wearing the New Balance Cush+ District Run for running and casual walks
A lot of consumers welcomed this running shoe for providing generous cushioning
The New Balance District Run is very supportive and perfect to wear for long runs and other activities, according to several reviewers
Some purchasers appreciated the value of this running partner considering the quality of its materials
A handful of commenters were impressed with New Balance District Run’s lightweight structure
The rubber outsole of this New Balance running shoe is very flexible and offers excellent traction on both wet and dry surfaces, as stated by various users
The breathability of this running companion’s upper unit was appreciated by some runners
This shoe offers a natural, bouncy ride, said a user
cons: A few testers reported that they felt pain on the top of their foot while running in a pair of the New Balance Cush+ District Run
Some people complained that the tongue of this shoe doesn’t open wide and it makes the shoe difficult to get on
A consumer mentioned that the strap that goes across the shoe makes it narrower
One reviewer explained that the top strap that holds the shoelace broke after a few times wearing the shoes

customer_reviews.title: First running shoe in years
customer_reviews.text: When I decided to start running after years of not running, I downloaded the C25K App and did the first two days wearing cross trainers. Big mistake. Too heavy & too stiff. So I ordered these shoes and I'm really enjoying them. They're light and the soles are soft with a nice spring. I will say that the tongue of each shoe had an annoying wrinkle that probably developed in packaging. A bit of care smoothing the wrinkles out when putting them on took care of that and the wrinkles have disappeared. If/when these shoes wear out, would I but then again? Yes, I would.
customer_reviews.author: geezzeer

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe bad Tongue!
customer_reviews.text: eh Comfy 4E new balance. Light weight. The foam soles break down quick had to put an insert in. The all mesh fabric design may wear out quicker than traditional leather sneakers. 3 months and I can see slight fraying where my big toe is. (update: the pinky toe wore through quicker) UPDATE: down to 3 stars... The tongue design on the shoe is a pain! It curls on the sides when you put them on. Many times I've taken a flat edge (think butter knife, chop-stick) after the shoe is on just to flat the tongue out against my foot. On that note I wouldn't buy them again, unless super cheap.
customer_reviews.author: KODIAK

customer_reviews.title: Overall exceptional sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light weight reliable sneaker for work (as I am a nurse and spend hours on my feet and put many miles on a day). I was skeptical simply because for a New Balance sneaker these were so cheap. But these sneakers are great! Not disappointed one bit! Fit as expected. Arch support provided. Lightweight mesh and very breathable!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.W

customer_reviews.text: I bought size 11 which I have used in the past with New Balance but they are a little too large, would rather have 10.5. Only reason I didn't return for a different pair was because it is a bit tight getting my foot into the shoe and was worried it would only be worse in a size smaller. I work on my feet though and after a week of use my feet feel great at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: RUNNING shoe.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great and comfortable running shoes. The sole isn't rubber, it's the Eva foam that the mid sole is made from so it's slippery as all heck on indoor surfaces but it makes for an incredibly comfortable run. Because of the foam bottom, this wears very quickly. Not recommended as a day to day shoe for non -runners.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are slightly smaller than expected, but the build quality is amazing and they look great! New Balance is always amazing for people like me with extra wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: firemedic2008

customer_reviews.title: Ok Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not the best and by far not the worst shoe out there. The look is clean, basic black and white. The shoe fits a little big and the comfort is ok. I added a insole into it to add a little more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: cJs

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these shoes. I bought them slightly as a joke as a dad gift for our baby shower. He has been raving about them since I gave them to him. Definitely buy them! They’re a great price and a cute shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: This shoe hurt my feet
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of wearing these on a 5 mile walk as soon as I took them out of the box. I couldn't wait to take these shoes off. When I woke this morning my heals hurt and continued all day today. This was not a break in problem. I felt every stone and every bump through the sole. I have owned 5 other pairs of New Balance shoes and liked every other pair. These shoes are so uncomfortable, I would not be surprised if they were knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Katses

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other New Balance shoe's I've ordered these are absolutely great, the fit, comfort and style are excellent, I've never received a pair of New Balance shoe's that I haven't liked, had problems with, fit was wrong or something with comfort, they've all been excellent and these shoes are no different, definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gove

customer_reviews.title: Best fit from extra wide I've goten online.
customer_reviews.text: New Balance is always great for wider sizes, and these did not disappoint. You always worry as a big guy that all the reviews complaining about fit are going to be extra-bad for you, but these shoes at this price is the best deal I've ever gotten. Fit perfectly (13 2X-wide) and really comfortable. The top is in fact rougher than expected, but I'll always have some kind of ankle sock on with these so it's a non-issue. Really impressed, might even get another because finding the right shoe at a retail shop as a wider width is almost impossible, or overly-expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Casey

customer_reviews.title: Just not a very comfortable shoe, Not Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I tired these and several other pairs of New Balance thru the Prime Wardrobe and NONE of them were comfortable and one pair had a restrictive stretch opening instead of the traditional tongue and split opening top. I bought a great pair of Nikes and another pair of Good Pumas. See my other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: The Reaper DRR  TM

customer_reviews.title: So, So shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is good priced. It has a good cushioned sole. It has a wide toe box. The one thing that was a big inconvenience was when you tied the shoe, the shoe would crease on top. So after hours of wearing it, the crease from the inside of the shoe would press on the upper part of your foot causing irritation. This shoe would not be good for long walks, but fine if you are sitting at a desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If the shoe fits, you are lucky.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is way off. I have a very wide foot Ordered a 8.5 EEEE. Not even near that size To short and too narrow. I have worn New Balance for many years. I love their products. I know this was an inexpensive pair of shoes, not my normal running shoe. However I would still expect the New Balance sizing to be consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control is flagging @NuBalance
customer_reviews.text: Liked the looks, and return service. Disliked the fit, ordered wide. Right fit okay (but not great) Left was impossible to tolerate for more than 3 minutes. It had to be 1 1/2 sizes too small. Quality control is flagging at NuBalance.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Danger

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and fit great
customer_reviews.text: I love New Balance. These shoes are no exception. They're extremely comfortable and stylish. I messed up a pair at work and ordered a second pair. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Langen

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 X-wide, that's what I ordered and they fit perfectly! Great looking and perfect for summer (or pretty much all year in Florida!)
customer_reviews.author: BPM

customer_reviews.title: It's a win-win-win!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves, LOVES these! They fit almost true to size and are surprisingly light. He says they fit very well and while they are light weight they are very supportive. Great product, excellent price, and a happy son! It's a win-win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Order down.
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I ordered my normal size and it was way too big. Had to return. Would buy again in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Meg.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for almost 2 months now and they feel great. I like that new balance actually has variety for 4E sizes. Nike has no love for the wide foot man.
customer_reviews.author: Off Brand Dad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I have wide feet so I like the fact that New Balance makes so many styles in side sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Just being honest
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the shoes. They way too light and the material is not as strong as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable shoes. Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Sadly. These shoes aren't that comfortable...and the advert shows a deceiving appearance. Very mediocre. So, no more than 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wide size because I've always have trouble finding the right fit. These one fit me perfectly and comfortable to use. I've run with these shoes for over a week now, and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: AMZNcustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a little too big I wear a 9.5 but in this shoe I could have bought a 8.5 or 9. But over all very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Grandson didn't care for the fit initially but as he wore them he became accustomed to the fit. Good value for the price. He says the sneakers are nicely cushioned and keep him stable.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Not a good shoe overall
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean material and fits weird. Better options out there
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! (11w)
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great! However the black/white color scheme is not like the advertised pictures. However, My husband likes them to much too return.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and I even added doctor soles for added support when running for my back
customer_reviews.author: charles hall

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, wide, and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Its extra wide,soft, smooth, good quality, and comfortable to walk and run in.
customer_reviews.author: Servando Garcia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: There is no padding on the sides or heel. Invest in some moleskin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: New Balance is what you expect, quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis shoe could use a little more arch support. Fit and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chef 1

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t worn these shoes yet but just wanted to let everyone know the picture with the “black and white” is not accurate to what’s received. The picture for the description shows the speckled sole with the red NB logo. That’s not the case. These shoes are straight up just black and white. Hate receiving something that’s not as shown. I expect to receive what’s pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Lee McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable as expected with NB
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable as expected. I always ask for New Balance. Good quality for the price and long lasting
customer_reviews.author: casual  reader.

customer_reviews.title: Best snickers I got
customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers I got in a long time perfect price can't be it now I just wish I got 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Madtime

customer_reviews.title: light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: light weight, airy and comfortable. fits perfectly for wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Waqar Chawla

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: On par with other New Balance flex bottom shoes, breathable material and ultra-light!
customer_reviews.author: Ainoa Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Great casual and/or running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love how light they are. I use them for running and casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Antonsen

customer_reviews.title: Light wieght and slipper like
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and light weight shoe for general all around use!
customer_reviews.author: Yooper64

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same shoe but in a different color....and for some reason it’s not fitting the same. Debating if returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: New balance shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoes for walking and running.The shoe material is soft and cushiony on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Servando Garcia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Until they weren’t.
customer_reviews.text: Super bummed out, they fit great and were really comfortable, but after the third week or so I tied them up and the eyelets snapped the worst part is that they won’t accept a return since I no longer have the box and it’s after the 30 day window.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Erin Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: 1 Month Buy
customer_reviews.text: Shoe eyelet snapped 4 days after 30 day warranty was up. Shoes were only used for walking around, nothing sport related.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda L. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Painful  blisters
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers gave my husband painful blisters. On top of foot. His foot is on the narrow side.
customer_reviews.author: Nery

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but could be wider
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable and I received favorable comments on their appearance but shoe is not as wide as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Heffy

customer_reviews.title: Use this seller.
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and it was clean when it came in and was in the box too. Was basically brand new and I only paid 26.50 from the original 42.00. Use this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Zech

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable feeling
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and feel real comfortable. Use them to workout every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair of these for great reason.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of running shoes as a Mid distance runner this are great for the distances I run. Usually 5K, 6K or 10K nothing over that threshold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last very long
customer_reviews.text: These lasted about four months before the soles became detached.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McDougall

customer_reviews.title: The sizing was not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The width of these was marked 4E but was not even a basic wide size...maybe in China or Sri Lanka it is considered wide but not in USA.
customer_reviews.author: John Bayalis

customer_reviews.title: Resign or scrap style. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good fit at all. My size, but could not get em on even with laces completely off. One star for look but from afar. Resign or scrap .
customer_reviews.author: llandin

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: My normal size was too small with the "comfort soles". The next half size fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Barcus

customer_reviews.title: Some time thing happen
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine, but I would to know what happened to the order on March 20th that I have not received.
customer_reviews.author: Karl b.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Great price. Extra wide is still not wide enoungh for my Fred Flintstone feet!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lomax

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap pair of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and nice, get what you pay for. Love the color
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was fast and the shoes fit well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ceekay

customer_reviews.title: Loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears Nike’s and Adidas only and he LOVES THESE!
customer_reviews.author: RENEE HALFHILL

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's District Run V1 Cush Shoe
product_meta.description: Transform your run with the New Balance Cush+ District Run running shoe for men. The running shoe features a supportive upper with a lightweight fit. Plus, an NB Comfort insert and a responsive EVA midsole offers a secure ride as you go the distance.
